reviews.review: Speechless. That’s literally the only word I can say about it. Beware: This movie will emotionally drain you in every way possible... but in a good way I think haha. Anyways go see the movie more than once right now. For real. THIS IS THAT MOVIE. LIKE THEY DID THAT. Not only were the fight scenes out of this world and unlike anything else, but they were just able to balance good storytelling and plot, with emotional scenes, humor unlike any other (marvel never disappoints. DC take notes sorry...), good characters, but being able to balance and flesh out all these characters is just... WOW. THIS MOVIE. I still can’t believe it. Seeing it like 10 more times tbh :D

I am still reeling this morning from watching AVENGERS: INFINITY WAR. The awaited payout for Marvel's 18 movie build up to this moment has been well worth the wait! This movie story has incredibly high stakes and Thanos will go down as the BEST comic book movie villain ever. RUN out and see it this weekend. You won't be able to catch your breath but be prepared.
Update - I've seen it twice now and it's even better the second time. Props to marvel Studios!
This movie is incredible for so many reason...you can't understand it untill you watch that masterpiece of russo's
Epic. Perfect. Godfather, Empire Strikes Back, Infinity War.

It was an emotional rollercoaster! So awesome, amazing fights, fantastic story, long awaited questions answered, just plain marvel awesome! On the edge of my seat many times, gasped rebeatly and pleasantly surprised I laughed a lot too!! Go and see this master piece of a huge, diverse, jaw widening movie. So annoyed I gotta wait for the 4th movie a whole year away?? overall WATCH IT!!!!!

Avengers: Infinity War is a film so hugely anticipated and ambitious that the stakes are higher than perhaps any other film ever made. And it goes beyond what we could've ever hoped for into a great, funny, heart wrenching, exiting, entertaining movie that makes you leave the cinema with goosebumps (the good kind).
FIRST OF ALL IF YOU HAVE LOVED THE REST OF MARVELS MOVIE WELL GET READY TO LOVE INFINITY WAR A TRILLION BILLIONS TIME MORE. Bring tissues. Stress ball. Plenty snacks. Great friends.
it's an amazing movie. marvel doesn't disappoint.
So many plot holes in this movie and I think this is the worst marvel movie I have ever seen. I gave two and a half stars because I call that mercy.
